title: Judgment
verses: O there will be mourning at the judgment seat of Christ.
O there will be mourning at the judgment seat of Christ.
Parents and children there will part, Parents and children there will part,
Wives and husbands there will part, Wives and husbands there will part,

metadata.musical_notation: Present with treble and bass clef
metadata.theological_significance: Emphasizes the solemnity of judgment and separation at Christ's return
